body: Orcs are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. All orcs have the following racial traits.
name: Orc

sections.body: Orcs can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.body: Orcs are always proficient with greataxes and falchions, and treat any weapon with the word “orc” in its name as a martial weapon.
sections.name: Weapon Familiarity

sections.body: Orcs begin play speaking Common and Orc. Orcs with high Intelligence scores can choose from among the following bonus languages: Dwarven, Giant, Gnoll, Goblin, Undercommon.
sections.name: Languages
